conbody.note: The content of this section is only relevant for NCC-VNF.

section.p: Generic CDRs follow a defined schema. The CDRs have a recordType tag, which is different for different types of CDRs. For SCUR CDRs, the recordType is set as OCSChargingRecord. As the CDR module is used by all NCC modules, there is a generic record module that contains all the records generated by the different NCC applications.

fig.codeblock: --GenericRecord GenericRecordTypes DEFINITIONS IMPLICIT TAGS ::= BEGIN GenericRecord ::= SET { recordType [0] OCTET STRING, recordElements [1] SEQUENCE OF RecordElement OPTIONAL, recordExtensions [2] SEQUENCE OF GenericRecordExtension OPTIONAL } GenericRecordExtension ::= SEQUENCE { recordProperty [0] OCTET STRING OPTIONAL, recordElements [1] SEQUENCE OF RecordElement OPTIONAL, recordSubExtensions [2] SEQUENCE OF GenericRecordExtension OPTIONAL } RecordElement ::= SEQUENCE { varName [0] OCTET STRING OPTIONAL, varValue [1] OCTET STRING OPTIONAL } END
